page.title: 13Norwich Airport
page.content: Norwich airport covers an area of over 700 acres of land.It is open all year round except for Christmas day.100 staff are employd there.It is open 6.15 A.M to 3.30 A.M next morning.There are 2 shifts,morning and afternoon.One company which operates from Norwich airport is air u.k.Planes cost 40;000 pounds and more and they mainly use f27's.1.2 million pounds is used each year for salaries.Fuel costs 2.50 per gallon.To repair the runway it costs 70.00 per metre.It ofers a good range of services for passengers inside the airport,including-an information desk, bureau de change,bar,coffee shop, restaurant,newsagent's,taxi rank,car hire,coaches by arrangment,car parking facilities and a first aid room.There are two flying schools.Over 200,000 passengers used the airport in 1984.
